title: Trump administration suggests layoffs ‘imminent’ as some federal staff told to ‘blame Democrats’ in out of office email notes – live
summary: Reports indicate that employees of the Department of Health and Human Services were instructed to utilize official email accounts for communicating messages critical of Democrats. This raises concerns about the misuse of government resources for political purposes. The directive highlights ongoing tensions within the agency regarding political discourse and its impact on public service.

title: Arsenal 2-0 Olympiakos: Champions League – live reaction
summary: Arsenal secured a second consecutive group-stage victory with a 2-0 win. Gabriel Martinelli opened the scoring, followed by a late goal from Bukayo Saka. The team's performance strengthens their position in the group.

title: Martinelli and Saka on the money as Arsenal sweep Olympiakos aside
summary: Arsenal secured their second consecutive win in the Champions League with a 2-0 victory over Olympiakos. Gabriel Martinelli scored an early goal to set the tone for the match. This result reinforces Arsenal's strong start in the tournament.
